qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, business, or a related field; Master's degree preferred.
Proven experience as a Technical Product Manager, Product Owner, or similar role, with a focus on consumer experience and AI implementation.

Strong technical background in AI technologies, including experience with Language Model Learning (LLM), Generative AI, natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning, with at least 2-3 Gen AI projects in your experience.
Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including Product Owners, Business Stakeholders, and technical architects.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
Strategic thinker with a passion for innovation and a track record of driving results in fast-paced environments.
Experience working in agile development methodologies and familiarity with PM tools and Agile frameworks.
